She was standing naked on her bedroom carpet and she suddenly realized that she needed to urinate. It wouldn't be the first time she had peed on the floor, so since nothing bad had happened the first time she peed here, Maggie decided to do it again. If one of her family members had been astute enough to watch the toddler, they may have averted this situation, but while they had their backs turned, Maggie slightly parted her chubby thighs, sighed audibly, and released a thick stream of urine onto the carpet. Only when they turned around, did her family see that it had indeed been potty time for Baby Maggie. What is their reaction now?
13222121122.title: Standing up and peeing on the floor.

132221211222.content: It all happened so fast they couldn’t have stopped her so Maggie finished on the carpet, does she have to poop
132221211222.title: They watched her empty her bladder onto the floor

132221212.content: It was only Lisa herself in her bedroom, but she was still suffering a loss of personal pride. Geniuses weren't supposed to wet their beds. Lisa liked to imagine herself as a "better" class of person. And right before her sat her old My Little Pony potty chair. Rainbow Dash and Twilight Sparkle would laugh at her, Lisa imagined. She even remembered the sounds her old potty made whenever a deposit was made into the basin. "That's a good little filly!" the ponies proclaimed, though Lisa thought it sounded like laughter. Lisa still had to pee, so she gingerly sat down upon "Celestia's Throne". She was amazed that her body didn't seem too large for her old potty. Maybe this could work, as a hopefully temporary situation. Lisa was feeling the tingle her body gave her as a signal that she needed to urinate. But suddenly she remembered the training pants. She should put them on now, so she'll have them when she gets off the potty. That was Lisa's reasoning, but it wasn't what happened. Lisa suddenly jumped up from the potty and ran across her bedroom to get the training pants. But she couldn't get the package open. Grunting and struggling with the plastic packaging removed the resolve she was using to keep her now full bladder in check. So when Marge suddenly entered Lisa's bedroom, she saw her naked daughter, an exploding package of pull-ons, and pee running down Lisa's legs."Lisa!" Marge exclaimed. "You were supposed to use your old potty if you couldn't make it to the bathroom in time! Why are you peeing all over the rug instead?" "I couldn't get them opened," Lisa replied weakly. Marge then wiped down her elder daughter thoroughly and wrestled her into a pair of the thick, pink pull-ons. With two school-aged bedwetters taken care of, Marge then went about....
132221212.title: Wet herself

choices: Asked Bart if he would like a diaper too
13223.content: Ever since her initial problems with potty training Bart, Marge wondered if maybe she was doing things wrong. There was no rule set in stone that she legally HAD TO potty train her children, so she completely stopped that day long ago. Bart was eventually trained by his observations of other kids. He learned to pee standing up first, as opposed to conventional training methods. As soon as Bart had mastered that skill, he wanted to pee everywhere he went, eager to show off to anyone willing to watch. Marge chuckled to herself at the memory of her special little guy being the whiz kid of Evergreen Terrace. Still smiling, she pulled up her nightgown and removed her panties. Then she pulled on the diaper undergarment, patted it into place, and pulled her nightgown back down. Then she.....
13223.title: A diaper for herself to wear

choices: Was it one of his parents?
133.content: Bart stumbled out of bed, still tired and yet needing to pee. He first looked underneath his bed for a suitable container, but his mother had discarded or moved anything that had once been there. Bart doubted that he could make it to the bathroom in time anyway, so he opened his closet door and pulled out the clothes hamper. Then, upon realizing the hamper had vents, he aimed for the wastebasket. Fortunately, it was right beside him, because Bart couldn't contain his urine any longer. It came rushing out in a full stream, splattering against the nearly empty tin, and saturating whatever items were inside. When Bart had finished, he turned to see someone in his doorway......
133.title: He peed in the wastebasket in his room

1331.title: Was it one of his parents?

choices: Some containers he could use to potty (pee or poo) in
13312.content: Bart jumped slightly and worried over the altercation that might follow. "I'm just glad you used the wastebasket. You could have peed all over the floor." "I wouldn't do that.....oh, sorry I wet the bed, Mom." "I know, Dear. Accidents happen to everybody. You don't need to feel badly about it." Bart was relieved to hear that. He helped Marge to change his bedding and then put on clean pajamas and underwear. While he was changing, Marge brought in some new things for Bart to keep in his bedroom:
13312.title: Marge

choices: Yes. A little precaution is good.
No. He thinks he can control his bladder on his own.
133121.content: "I'm not going to force you to use these, but they are here so you may feel more comfortable. I also want you to feel free to try them at any time, even if it's just because you don't feel like getting out of bed or walking all the way down that long hallway to the bathroom. Sometimes I can't make it to the toilet in time either. Believe me, Bart. This is very common and nothing to be ashamed of," Marge explained. Does Bart decide to use the products?
133121.title: Waterproof bedding and diapers

1331211.content: Bart took one of the pads and laid it atop his bottom sheet. Then he examined the diaper. Does he put one on?
1331211.title: Yes. A little precaution is good.

choices: Not yet, but he needed to!
13312111.content: It was the type of protection that he could pull up or down, much like briefs except without a fly in the front. Bart laid back on his bed and wondered how it would feel to use the diaper. It would be awhile before he had to pee again, but he really wanted to try wetting the diaper. Would it hold very much or would it leak? Bart marvelled at the softness against his penis. Then he settled back with his eyes closed and went to sleep. When he awoke, had Bart used his new diaper?
13312111.title: Yes

choices: So far, it was soaked with pee
He peed and pooped in his sleep
133121111.content: What had Bart added to his diaper?
133121111.title: Yes, it was full!

choices: Yes, he wants to use diapers all the time.
No, the accidents are mostly at night
1331211111.content: Bart awoke to mixed feelings. He was glad he had wet his new diaper but wished he could have been awake while doing so. But he soon had the opportunity to fulfill that wish, as his morning bladder surged. The urge was strong and knowing he was wearing protection seemed to increase his desire to release the golden fluid even more. Bart peeled back the top of the diaper just a bit, so he could watch himself peeing into it. It felt spongy and very warm. Bart wondered if he would start wetting every time he slept. If he did, he hoped it would be this comfortable. Then he thought that maybe he should wear protection during the daytime. Does he?
1331211111.title: So far, it was soaked with pee

choices: Yes. Bart is totally into this new lifestyle
No, he just likes to play with the diapers
13312111111.content: Although the diapers were intended for sleep protection, Bart wants to wear them for convenience. Does he train his body to become incontinent?
13312111111.title: Yes, he wants to use diapers all the time.

choices: Yes, it was normal in their family
No, Marge takes him to see Dr. Hibbert
133121111111.content: Bart researched everything he could find on the internet and realized there were many other folks who liked wearing diapers. Many of them were adults and teens, but each of them had positive things to say about their chosen lifestyle. There were even teachings devoted to those who wanted to regress their urinary systems and relearn how to wet their beds. Bart liked the cozy feeling it gave him when he wet his bed now. The waterproof pad kept the wetness surrounding him. The diapers helped too, although he had totally flooded them a few times. When that happened at night, he'd just pull it off and sleep bottomless as his bed was already wet. Did Bart's family accept this "change" in Bart?
133121111111.title: Yes. Bart is totally into this new lifestyle

133122.content: "I brought you some things that may help you just in case you can't make it to the bathroom in time." Marge then showed Bart the items. A pee bottle with lid, a bucket with trashbags (for poo), and some waterproof bedding. "I also have diapers and disposable training pants if you need them, but I didn't want to embarrass you by assuming you'd wear them." Then she left the room and Bart examined the items. Which does he try first?
133122.title: Some containers he could use to potty (pee or p...

13312222.content: How about there also being a training potty there
13312222.title: The poo bucket

134.content: Bart remembered he always kept an empty bottle or jar near his bedside table. His mother always expected Bart to reach the bathroom, but sometimes that wasn't as convenient as just having a container to whiz in. Uncapping the quart-sized bottle, Bart positioned himself and began to fill the receptacle with the remains of his bladder. An audible sigh came from the boy as his golden fluid spilled into the bottle. Just when he had almost finished.....
134.title: He found a bottle or other container to use

choices: To air out the urine smell
So he could pee out the window
135.content: Why did Bart open his bedroom window?
135.title: He opened a window

choices: A package of diapers in his size
1352.content: It wasn't a well-thought-out plan, but Bart hightailed it out the window and ran to his treehouse. Once he had made the ascent, Bart stripped off his wet bedclothes and grabbed something he'd kept hidden there -- it was.....
1352.title: To climb outside

13523.content: Bart had happened to have some clean sheets, a blanket, and a sleeping bag stored in his treehouse, because he sometimes liked to sleep out there when Milhouse stayed overnight. It was their version of camping and Marge wanted them to be comfortable. Bart was grateful to have them now. He grabbed the bedding and was climbing back into his window, when he heard his sister Lisa, crying. Bart tossed the clean bedding onto a chair before opening his bedroom door. There stood Lisa, sobbing while wearing....
13523.title: Clean, dry bedding

choices: Lisa started peeing in his bedroom
135231.content: Bart instinctively gathered his little sister into a hug. His pajamas were still wet so he wasn't bothered by the condition of her attire. They stood in the odd embrace until they started shivering. Then Bart asked if she'd had a nightmare. Lisa nodded. Bart summarized his,"Mine was about magical ponies and clowns....and Sideshow Bob." "Freddie Kreuger," explained Lisa. They moved to sit atop Bart's still-wet bed. "The magical pony part didn't sound so bad," Lisa commented. "It was weird though. Some were unicorns and pegasi. And a few were wearing diapers." Bart answered. "But when the evil clowns ganged up on me, I peed in the dream. Then I woke up with a wet bed." "A claw grabbed me," Lisa replied. "Like this?" Bart grabbed Lisa, pushing her down while tickling her stomach. "Bart! You're gonna make me pee again!" Bart then realized he should have relieved himself when he was outside. "Does anyone else know you peed your bed, Lis?" The girl shook her head "no". "Me either. If we can clean it up ourselves, maybe we can keep it a secret." With that, Bart started to remove his wet bedding. But as he was leaning over the bed to untuck the blanket from the corners of his mattress......
135231.title: Her wet nightgown

choices: Marge walks in on them and notices that they're both wet
1352312.content:
Just as Bart was about to take his sheets off his mattress, he heard Lisa gasp in shock. He quickly turned around and saw Lisa crying as the pee stain on her nightgown grew bigger. Bart walked over to Lisa and comforted her telling her it would be ok.

What happens next?
1352312.title: Lisa started peeing in his bedroom

13523122.content:
"Did my special little guy and my brainy beauty wet themselves?" Marge asked. "Yes Mommy, we did." they said sadly. "It's all right, sweeties. Most kids wet the bed sometimes, it's natural. Here, let me get you something to wear." Marge exclaimed as she took off Bart and Lisa's wet sleepwear and underwear and dresses them in disposable training pants in their sizes: blue for Bart and pink for Lisa. "Oh darlings, you two look adorable in them. If you can't make it to the bathroom, you can use these." Marge cooed as she showed Bart and Lisa two beautiful potties: blue for Bart and pink for Lisa.

Do they like them?
13523122.title: Marge walks in on them and notices that they...

choices: They asked if they would be babied other ways too
135231221.content: "Oh, Mommy. Mine's SO beautiful." Lisa sighed. ""I really like mine, too, Mommy." Bart said. "I thought you two would like them." Marge replied.
135231221.title: Yes

1352312211.content: Bart and Lisa were competitive siblings, so both wanted to try out their new potties right away. Marge got them seated and strapped in, and then waited to see and hear results. Who is first to "perform" ?
1352312211.title: They tried them out.

13523122112.content: To be fair, Lisa was the first one to actually pee, BUT....did she do her peeing in the potty?
13523122112.title: Baby Wisa

choices: She liked the way it felt to wet herself
135231221121.content: Lisa was really excited about going potty, but got stage fright and couldn't actually do anything, so Marge decided she could get up and play first to relax, and then try again later. Lisa pulled up her pretty pink training panties and scampered off, but not fifteen minutes later, ran back into the room, sobbing. Her lacy padded panties were completely soaked with urine. Lisa simply wasn't ready for potty training. She later confessed that she'd known when she needed to pee, but didn't want to stop playing. So she kept on and waited, and even when she knew she was going to wet her panties, Lisa still didn't return. Instead, she stayed in the playroom and stood still as she peed, making no attempt to get to her potty or not make a mess. When asked why, Lisa simply stated...
135231221121.title: No

choices: "Wisa wan some numnums fwom Mommah's boobies."
1352312212.content:
"Would my two sweet little babies like anything else?"
How do new babies Barty and Wisa respond?
1352312212.title: They asked if they would be babied other ways too

choices: One or more of the Springfield Elementary teachers?
15.content: Who else is having this problem in their family?
15.title: Other Springfieldians (the Flanders,' Lovej...

151.content: Oh, diddily no! Which of the good Flanders family has a problem?
151.title: Ned Flanders, Rod, or Todd?

choices: give them something to go potty in
153.content: Sherri and Terri woke up wet in their shared bed. Their mother saw them wet and told them it was okay because things like this happen to children and the best way to solve this problem is to...
153.title: Terri and/or Sherri?

1532.content: Their mother took off their wet nightgowns and panties, then puts them in frilly pink training panties and gave them a pink double potty. "Oh, mommy! They're SO beautiful!" The girls said. "I'm glad you like them, sweeties. Would you like to try out your potty?" their mother asked.
1532.title: give them something to go potty in

choices: Yes, they were eager to please their mother.
15321.content: Did the new potty inspire them to use it?

choices: Their mother paid them to use the potty
Potties were put in every room of their house
153211.content: Terri and Sherri made a great effort to use their new potty chair and as added incentive....
153211.title: Yes, they were eager to please their mother.

choices: Why don't I change your bed and give you some privacy?
Why don't I tickle you to make you pee?
153212.content: Terri sat down on one side, and Sherri took the other. But it wasn't that simple. The potty chair was made of hard, cold plastic, and their bed was warm and soft. The twins just couldn't relax enough to produce a deposit, and it didn't help that their mother was standing right there, staring at them in this vulnerable position. Then their mother made a suggestion.....
153212.title: No, they had "stage fright".

choices: Yes, she wants control over her weak bladder
1532121.content: The twins looked at each other and agreed. But their mother was still in the room, changing their bed linens. Still, she wasn't naive. She knew her daughters very well, knew of their stubborn streaks, and somewhat doubted this had been an accidental bedwetting. So she took the precaution of placing a vinyl mattress pad beneath the sheets. This way, if her girls urinated due to accidents, procrastination in getting up, or sheer pleasure, the mattress would be protected. The girls busied themselves with books while seated on the twin potties, so they didn't notice the crinkle of the vinyl sheet being placed over their shared mattress. Their mother smiled when she heard a tinkling sound in one of the potty basins, and a plop in the other, followed by a gush of urine. "Eewww," Terri commented on her sister's bowel movement, "that stinks!" "It would have stunk more if I'd done it in our bed," Sherri reminded her. "Good thing you only had to pee," Terri commented. There, she had admitted that Sherri peed in the bed while awake. "I only waited because I didn't want to wreck our mattress," Terri admitted, letting out another stream of pee into the potty. "I think your bladder is bigger than mine," admitted Sherri to her sister. "I just can't seem to hold mine as long. Whenever I try, it hurts." "You just need to build up your capacity," Terri advised. "I'll help you start training your bladder, if you like," she offered. Does Sherri take her sister's offer?
1532121.title: Why don't I change your bed and give you so...

choices: Yes. Sherri wants to attract boys, not turn them off
No, she's happy to have uncontrolled wetting
15321212.content: "I don't know, Terri. I like how warm our bed feels when we pee in it. And I really like wetting my panties." "But boys won't want to go out with us if we keep wetting ourselves, Sherri." Sherri paused before releasing another stream. She had never tried to hold her pee for longer than a half hour. By then, she was usually bursting to release. Does she reconsider?
15321212.title: No, she likes wetting

155.content: For one joke comic book bad had an adopted son he nAmed prius. So them or
155.title: A different family?

choices: Jeffrey assumes Prius is slow, but loves him more
Jeffrey assumes the boy just has language issues.
1551.content:
Prius, as he was called now, had a pretty good life in Cambodia. It wasn't great, but not terrible. So he was a little saddened, and surprised to hear hed been adopted. He remembered some fat American talking ay him for a while, and the next thing he knew. He was on a private plane to the US. So far, things didn't seem so bad, the chairs on the plane where huge, and then his new father spoke to him.
"Are you having fun Prius, hm? Avez-vous faim?" The man cooed as if Prius was four instead of ten and didn't speak English. He just sort of stared at the man, shocked. And with no answer Jeffery went on.
"Nǐ èle ma?" He asked in Manderin, still no answer.
"tae​ anak​ khlean​ haey​ ryy​ now ?"
Though Prius understood the question, all four times, he was amazed by the tone used, not to mention the poor accents.
"You know "food"?" Jeffrey asked and patted his stomach. FINALLY, Prius nodded slightly with the same look to his face.
1551.title: CBC and Prius

choices: He makes it (but had to be escorted)
He has trouble finding it in time
15511.content:
The look on his face didn't change, but Jeff (or CBG as some people called him) just smiled and tried to relax. So what if his boy seemed a little slow on the uptake. Jeff just rubbed his hair and smiled.
"Yeees, we'll get something to eat very soon."
For now though the boy had to have just water and soon he had to go to the bathroom...
15511.title: Jeffrey assumes Prius is slow, but loves him more

choices: He sighs and takes his wet bed sheets to wash
15531.content:
Seymour was having an awful dream, It was about Vietnam, there was lots of explosions and people dying, Seymour was terrified at the gruesome sights, he ran and ran and then....He woke up, tears were falling down his cheeks, and his bed was wet.





What does he do now?
15531.title: Seymour Skinner

choices: nah, it's just a quick bath.
155311.content:
Seymour then saw that he wet the bed, he started crying. "MOMMY!" Seymour cried, then his mother came in his room. "What the heck is going on?!" His mother shouted. "Mommy, I had a nightmare!" Seymour was whimpering, his mother noticed this and felt a little bad for him. "Aw, it's okay Spanky. I see that you also had an accident, c'mon, let's get you cleaned up." Then she takes him to the bathroom.





Bubbles or no Bubbles in the tub?
155311.title: "MOMMY! I had a nightmare!"

info.brief_description: The Simpsons and others in Springfield become incontinent.
info.description:
**DISCLAIMER: I do not own The Simpsons and receive no compensation for these stories!!**

This item has a Graphic Content rating due to the fact that some readers are offended at the topic of excretory bodily functions. Expect pee and poo in this story, as well as diapers, training pants, and bathroom use or disuse. Maggie is included, even though she has an already-diapered bottom. The Simpsons and other characters maintain their own ages.
NO shrinking, giant growth spurts, or gender reassignments. NO vore or killing off characters. I reserve the right to edit or delete chapters for content violations. Nudity is permitted for the purposes of elimination, changes, and bathing. Minimal sexual content allowed, but NO incest, please!! Minimal expletives allowed but none that use the names of God or Jesus Christ.


Is there something in the Springfield water system? Whatever the reason, citizens are waking up wet!! What once was relegated to the baby and toddler population is now reaching the adults, in epic proportions. Expect sales of incontinence products to skyrocket in Springfield, USA. Who is the first to be hit with this issue?
